input_text:
Job Title: Associate Marketing Manager

Location: Minneapolis, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Business Development, Marketing

Description:
The Associate Marketing Manager (AMM) position supports and/or leads short & long-term strategic marketing responsibility for Service and Consumer Marketing within Chronic Care Division. Responsibilities would include, but are not limited to, the continued development and implementation of the Ambassador program, consumer engagement toolbox for Territory Managers, support of consumer campaigns and healthcare professional (HCP) Coloplast Care marketing activities.

The AMM works closely with the Service and Consumer Marketing team, members of the Consumer Services team, our field sales teams and across the organization local & global. We thrive on anticipating needs and taking actions that exceed the expectations of healthcare professionals and users, creating a community of support.

Coloplast is the global market leader in Continence & Ostomy Care and has the ambition to play a dominant role in the US market. Coloplast continues to invest in life changing products and services and the Service and Consumer Marketing team will play a key role in our growth in the US.

 Major Areas of Accountability 

 Lead the continued development and execution of the Ambassador program  Drive the development of a simple and actionable strategy and toolbox to support consumer engagement for field sales  Support content development for consumer facing campaigns  Support HCP marketing and engagement activities for the Coloplast Care program  Ensure high touch, collaboration and partnership with a variety of local and global individuals and teams  Maintain a solid understanding of the market by monitoring the competitive marketing activity, identifying trends or changes that will impact business, and recommending actions and contingency plans to maximize opportunities for Coloplast 



Basic Qualifications

 2 years Marketing experience, preferably in the healthcare field  Demonstrated ability to work across functions to prioritize and drive strategic objectives  Excellent oral and written communication skills  Proficient in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint and Word  High degree of initiative and self-motivation with a strong sense of accountability  Ability to identify, analyze and solve problems with minimal direction and make decisions with confidence  Aptitude to successfully prioritize and manage multiple tasks while adhering to deadlines  Approximately 25% travel (minimum twice per quarter)  BS/BA required, Business or Marketing preferred  Coloplast employees are required to conduct business to the highest ethical and professional standards; comply with applicable laws and regulations, the Advamed Code of Ethics on Interactions with Healthcare Professionals, and company policies. 



Pursuing an ambitious growth agenda, Coloplast develops and markets products and services that make life easier for people with intimate healthcare needs. Employing about 16,000 people and with products available in more than 143 countries, we are one of the world ´ s leading medical device companies. We are constantly growing our business and always looking for new ways to move forward – we explore, learn and look for new ways of doing things.

Visit us on Coloplast.com .

Watch the film. Follow us on LinkedIn . Like us on Facebook .

Coloplast employees are required to conduct business to the highest ethical and professional standards; comply with applicable laws and regulations, the Advamed Code of Ethics on Interactions with Healthcare Professionals, and company policies.

Coloplast is committed to a policy of Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) which means we employ and promote individuals based on their merits, regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, status with regards to public assistance or any other protected classification.

56592

Experience Level (if available): None
